title: How can  i delete the game and reinstall it
body:
i already try the control panel and remove it and try to download the game again but it said already have a league of legend setting and it don't let me go in ? 
Please Help
Thank You

replies.body: nvm i got it, just reinstall it  with a diff. sever soo

If you want to do a full and complete re-install, make sure to follow the [guide we have found here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040).  It should ensure that everything is wiped and you are good to go to start completely over.

Let me know if those steps still don't seem to have completely wiped everything!
